import React from 'react' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { clearItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' const CheckoutItem = ( { cartItem: { name, imageUrl, price, quantity }, clearItem } ) => (
{name} {quantity} {price}
✕
) export default connect(null, {clearItem})(CheckoutItem)
